page.title: 01LUNDWOOD
page.content: Activities in Lundwood centres around a small{shopping}area.The shops are situated on the main road. The shops are owned mainly by{local people}and are old fashioned in appearance. Very little money has been spent on changing them over the years. The shops cater for the basic need of the Lundwood Community. There exists several{businesses}a post office, bread shop, general dealers, a bingo hall,florist and pet food shop, hairdressers, cafe, turf accountants, clothes and wool shop. There are also two churches, two public houses and two working mens clubs. There are also three fish and chip shops. They open most lunch times and evenings. {Trade}is good in the area apart from the recent effects of the miners strike. The{local people}make good use of the bus service in Lundwood.
